property.caption: Maps API Access Key
property.description: The Google Maps JavaScript API v3 does not require an API key to function correctly. However, Google strongly encourages you to load the Maps API using an APIs Console key which allows you to monitor your application's Maps API usage.

property.caption: Objects
property.description: The objects to show on the map.

property.caption: XPath Constraint
property.description: The XPath constraint on the objects.

property.caption: Pan to context
property.description: If set to true, if the dataview object changes, the map will pan automatically to the accompanying marker. In this case, the widget will assume that the contextobject contains a lat and long attribute.

property.caption: Default latitude
property.description: Default latitude for the map to start at.

property.caption: Default longitude
property.description: Default longitude for the map to start at.

property.caption: Single item zoom level
property.description: The zoom level used when displaying a single item. 1 is the whole world, 15 is city level, 20 is house level.

property.caption: Refresh on entity changes
property.description: This option refreshes all the markers when an object of the corresponding entity is changed/added/removed. This will retrieve the entire list of objects everytime and map them again. Be aware that this might give performance issues when mapping big amounts or mapping a frequently used entity.

property.caption: Drag
property.description: Enable/disable dragging a map using the mouse

property.caption: Type
property.description: Enable/disable Map Type control

property.caption: Scroll
property.description: Enable/disable using the scrollwheel to zoom in/out

property.caption: Streetview
property.description: Enable/disable Streetview control

property.caption: Zoom Control
property.description: Enable/disable Zoom control

property.caption: Tilt
property.description: Angle of the map. This can be set to 45 degrees, if this is available for some locations and only when using type Satellite or Hybrid. It will automatically switch to 0 degrees if it is not available.

property.caption: Marker attribute
property.description: The attribute that will be displayed in the marker info bubble. (Not required)

property.caption: Onclick microflow
property.description: Microflow that will be exectuted when you click on a marker. Takes the entity of the Objects as input parameter

property.caption: Latitude attribute
property.description: The latitude attribute.

property.caption: Longtitude attribute
property.description: The longtitude attribute.

property.caption: Height
property.description: The map's height in px.

property.caption: Width
property.description: The map's width in px or percent.

property.caption: Maptype
property.description: Set the default map type

property.caption: Enum attribute
property.description: The enumeration for the marker images.

property.caption: Default icon
property.description: The default image to use if no enumeration is available.

property.caption: Enum based marker images
property.description: Set images for the markers based on an enumeration.

property.caption: Enum key
property.description: The enum key as string. (Does not recognize empty '' enum value. Use the default icon for these.)

property.caption: Image
property.description: The image for the enumeration key.

property.caption: Style Array
property.description: Use this to add custom styles to your maps.

property.caption: Show a progress bar when loading
property.description: If the map has a lot of markers to load, it can appear unresponsive. This progress bar will tell the user it is loading the markers

property.caption: Loading message
property.description: The message that appears in the progress bar
